R

releasedByCompany(Coupon, String) - Method in interface dao.CouponDAO
 
releasedByCompany(Coupon, String) - Method in class dbdao.CouponDBDAO
This auxiliary method returns if the Coupon released by specific Company.
removeCompany(Company) - Method in interface dao.CompanyDAO
 
removeCompany(Company) - Method in class dbdao.CompanyDBDAO
The method doesn't remove the Company from the database but sets the state of the Company, all Coupons released by it and all records in the tables company_coupon and customer_coupon as inactive (false) in order to keep a history of actions.
removeCompany(Company) - Method in class facades.AdminFacade
The method sets the state of Company, all it's coupons and the links between Customer's and Company's Coupons and between Company and Coupon as inactive.
removeCompany(Company) - Method in class facades.CouponClientFacadeSuperClass
 
removeCoupon(Coupon) - Method in interface dao.CouponDAO
 
removeCoupon(Coupon) - Method in class dbdao.CouponDBDAO
The method doesn't remove the Coupon from the database but sets the state of the Coupon and records in the join tables (customer_coupon, company_coupon) as inactive (false) in order to keep a history of actions.
removeCoupon(Coupon) - Method in class facades.CompanyFacade
This method checks if the Coupon released by the Company that manages the account and removes the Coupon if the Coupon belongs to the Company.
removeCoupon(Coupon) - Method in class facades.CouponClientFacadeSuperClass
 
removeCustomer(Customer) - Method in interface dao.CustomerDAO
 
removeCustomer(Customer) - Method in class dbdao.CustomerDBDAO
The method doesn't remove the Customer from the database but sets the state of the Customer and records of purchased coupons in the table customer_coupon as inactive (false) in order to keep a history of actions.
removeCustomer(Customer) - Method in class facades.AdminFacade
The method doesn't remove the Customer from the database but sets the state of the Customer and records of purchased coupons in the table customer_coupon as inactive (false) in order to keep a history of actions.
removeCustomer(Customer) - Method in class facades.CouponClientFacadeSuperClass
 
returnConnection(Connection) - Method in class connection.ConnectionPoolSingleton
The method returns given connection to the pool.
run() - Method in class main.DailyCouponExpirationTask
